statements: SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis;
SELECT id, comment FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, tone_score FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY tone_score DESC;
SELECT comment FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_comments FROM SentimentAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY tone_score DESC;
SELECT id, tone_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY tone_score ASC;
SELECT comment FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, tone_score FROM SentimentAnalysis GROUP BY id HAVING AVG(tone_score) > 0.3;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis;
SELECT tone_score, comment_text FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY tone_score DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ToneAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT tone_name, analysis_date FROM ToneAnalysis WHERE tone_name LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT tone_id, tone_name, analysis_date FROM ToneAnalysis
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone_score > 0.5
SELECT comment_id, comment_text, tone_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone_score < 0.3
SELECT tone_name FROM ToneAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY comment_id DESC
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis;
SELECT comment, tone FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone='positive';
SELECT username, email FROM Commenters ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT comment_id, sentiment_score FROM AnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT result_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment_score FROM AnalysisResults GROUP BY result_id;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT comment, tone FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE tone = 'Positive' AND comment LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT c.username, a.sentiment_score FROM Commenters c JOIN AnalysisResults a ON c.commenter_id = a.comment_id WHERE a.sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY a.analyzed_at DESC;

SELECT s.id, s.comment, a.analyzed_at FROM SentimentAnalysis s LEFT JOIN AnalysisResults a ON s.id = a.comment_id WHERE a.sentiment_score < 0.3 AND a.analyzed_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT c.username, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM Commenters c JOIN SentimentAnalysis s ON c.commenter_id = s.id GROUP BY c.username HAVING total_comments > 3 ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Comments;
SELECT id, comment_text FROM Comments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT message_text AS message, sentiment_score FROM Messages WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT Users.username, SentimentAnalysis.overall_sentiment_score FROM Users JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON Users.user_id = SentimentAnalysis.user_id;

SELECT Messages.message_text, Comments.comment_text, SentimentAnalysis.overall_sentiment_score FROM Messages JOIN Comments ON Messages.id = Comments.id JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON Comments.id = SentimentAnalysis.comment_id ORDER BY SentimentAnalysis.overall_sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM Messages;
SELECT id, message_text FROM Messages WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, message_text, sentiment_score FROM Messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT Users.username, Comments.comment_text FROM Users JOIN Comments ON Users.user_id = Comments.id;

SELECT Messages.message_text, SentimentAnalysis.overall_sentiment_score FROM Messages JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON Messages.id = SentimentAnalysis.message_id WHERE SentimentAnalysis.overall_sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_score FROM comments WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT message_text, user_id FROM messages ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT text_type, average_sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message_text, sentiment_score FROM messages WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT text_type, average_sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE total_comments > 100 ORDER BY average_sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_score FROM analysis_results ORDER BY comment_id ASC LIMIT 10;
